animation

Class AnimatedSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • animation.AnimatedSimulation

  • public abstract class AnimatedSimulation
extends javafx.application.Application
    Extend this class to create an animation and visualize the simulation. This is generally used for debugging and to see all the entities and their values during a simulation.
    Author:
    Nicolas Saumure

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to start the application. Setups the simulation. Creates the animation window to display the simulation. Setups the animation window. Displays the window. Calls method terminate once the window is closed.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
